metadata.subject: Alberta Foundation for the Literary Arts
Literary prizes
metadata.title: Annual report
metadata.creator: Alberta Foundation for the Literary Arts
metadata.description: "As Chairman of The Alberta Foundation for the Literary Arts, I am pleased to submit the annual report for 1985-86, our second such report and the first one representing an entire year of operation." -- Chairman's message (Annual report, 1985/1986)
"The Alberta Foundation for the Literary Arts was created in May of 1984 ...." -- p. 2 (Annual report, 1989/1990)
Highlights of grants (rather than prizes) distributed to various Alberta writing projects
Merged with: Alberta Art Foundation. Annual report; and: Alberta Foundation for the Performing Arts. Annual report; to form: Alberta Foundation for the Arts. Annual report
